attributes.title: Worst app ever!
attributes.review: From the moment I downloaded this app my phone started acting up and every time I open the app it kept crashing and constantly going on a loop of crashing over and over again I took my phone to a friend of mine to fix it but he said he didn’t know what the problem was and when I deleted this app my phone started working better I actually want to show my support for Trump but I changed my mind after the app had almost crashed my phone. IF YOUR READING THIS PLEASE DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP I ALMOST LOST ALL OF MY DATA AND HAD TO GO TO APPLE TO FIX IT FOR ME!!

attributes.title: ✨🧚🏻‍♀️#blm🧚🏻‍♀️✨
attributes.review:
i downloaded this app in order to learn, and see what was going on inside of the president’s (albeit very small) mind. i was absolutely appalled. every time this app was opened on my phone, the sounds of nails dragging down a chalkboard blasted from my phone. this is unacceptable. there were many glitches and software issues. because of this terrible app, my pet caterpillar and i will be unable to attend any rallies, as we will be going for walks, and doing some much needed cleaning (vacuuming the ceiling, painting our toilet, etc).
oh, and BLACK👏LIVES👏MATTER👏
see ya, bunker boy!✨🧚🏻‍♀️

attributes.title: this is for u bunker boy
attributes.review: had the misfortune of thinking this app was snik snok before downloading. ⚠️BE WARNED: after downloading this app i kept having reoccurring nightmares about a Cheeto with a micro peen and a bad spray tan. in the nightmare i was forced to spray tan this misogynistic homophobic racist shell of a human being over and over, i have been to therapy over these dreams and have since been diagnosed with a condition that prevents me from seeing any color but orange 🍊. my life has become a nightmare that i can’t escape. demons with squinty eyes and fake blonde comb overs haunt me every moment of every day. also blm & free barron yeah ❤️

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APPP IT CRASHED ME AND MY FRIENDS PHONE!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it has crashed my phone severely. I told me friends to download it as well and it also crashed their phone. This app is a waste of time and IS SECRETLY LETTING RUSSIANS SPY ON YOUUUU!!! I mean come on if tic tok is letting China spy on us then why wouldn’t this trump app help Russia spy on us. I do have proof the this but I feel uncomfortable speaking about it concerning this app has already made my phone crash. I am begging you please don’t get this app and don’t vote for trump him and Russians are trying to spy on you. Stay safe loves and don’t get hacked and spied on💕💕

attributes.title: worst app ever ☺️
attributes.review: this is the WORST app ever made . i don’t even know why a sexist, racist, rapist, misogynistic 🍊 man should even have his own app 🙈 someone was obviously forced to make this app for him since a man like him should never have his own app. the app made my phone glitch for 1 week straight . and his pêñ ï š would keep on poping up on my screen and it was all over twitter and instagram since it got leaked , it was truly disturbing and scarring 😖 . so please never download this app unless you want this to happen to you and trust me you don’t 😌anyways bye beachesssss 😜

attributes.title: THIS APP IS SO BAD THAT SUICIDE RATES KEPT SKYROCKETING
attributes.review: This app makes me want to end it all I hate how laggy it is every single day it kept on freezing then refreshing every 30 seconds, why do I keep on seeing an orange on my screen, this app is so bad even a hacker won’t touch it, it’s disgusting and vile, why is there pornography on my screen when I go on it, this app makes me want to end my life by how scary it is, it’s putting my life in danger sometimes there’s a message telling me to vote for a Cheeto Cheetos can’t run for president it’s impossible Cheetos don’t have a brain. THIS APP IS THE REASON IM FAILING IN LIFE, ITS RUINING MY LIFE

attributes.title: To much orange
attributes.review: So to start of this app took a really long time to download and when it did this really fat orange thing popped up on my screen I almost Screamed to death until I realized that it’s or rapist/racist/orange president. When I made an account to go on I and Immediately regretted that discussion I kept on scrolling down and seeing these horrible things being said there was absolutely nothing great about it especially sense I downloaded this app to find reasons to actually like our president then I realized that he will never change.😁

attributes.title: disgrace.
attributes.review: i know many people may not believe this review because there are so many people leaving negative reviews, but i mean this from the bottom of my heart. this app is terrible. it’s disorganized and is filled with so much unneeded information. for someone who prefers simple things, i found this app to be like the last season of arrested development; unneeded and confusing. if you’re looking for a quick and easy way to stay informed about white supremacy and breaking the law, this is not the app for you for it was not easy. overall, this app was terrible. if not because it caused me to lose brain cells, then because it started to brainwash me. luckily i deleted it before any permanent damage was done (i.e. i only yelled maga one night in my sleep). this app was less organized than the oval office and that’s saying a lot. so, to summarize: just no❤️

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to try and see if I could even try to comprehend why Donald does the things he does and says what he says, and do you  know what I found?.... he’s a complete idiot with no political background blabbering about whatever he feels like in the moment. Honestly, no one cares why you needed two hands to drink a cup of water, or why you were slipping down a ramp in dress shoes because in the end we know you are a sexist, racist, white supremacists and probably every other bad title ending in -ist and America Deserves better than you.

attributes.title: My dog 🐶 bit slime balls ⚽️ because of it
attributes.review: This app was the 🍊 worst 😣 thing EVER!!! So first I got 😤 it and then 🤯 you’ll never 🤫 guess what happened next ❌➡️ a creepy 👹 orange slob 🤢 literally made of slime 🥴 that had a little rats nest on top 🐀supposedly his hair 💇‍♂️ had 👀 eyes and a nose 👃🏼 and a mouth 👄 and got slime 🥵 all over my back yard 🤬 then my dog 🐶 bit the slime 🍯🥜 where it hurt 😞 🥳🤭 and the blob 🤡 melted on the go round in pain 🙀👽 and then ➡️ I found out 😱 that that was TRUMP 💩☠️ and I accidentally killed 💀him!!! More my dog tho 🤑🤒🤓 so we deleted the app 😍😇 and we lived happily 🤪 ever 🧐 after 😏hehe 😔😋🥳🤩🙂🙂
